attributes.action: order an urgent review of the decision to diminish front-line healthcare within Enfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The loss of major A&E, acute stroke services, consultant-led maternity and children's care from Chase Farm Hospital is about to put lives at risk. 

With the local NHS seemingly unable to grasp the consequences of its proposed actions, government ministers must step in to protect the health of Enfield residents.
